title: {{lovesickness|HighlightDiseaseOnset}}
description:
This mod makes it much easier to notice the onset of disease symptoms.

The text describing the disease onset, e.g. "Your skin itches." is now shown in red.

A preference is also added to show the message as a popup.

https://github.com/Cattlesquat/HighlightDiseaseOnset
author: {{ubernostrum|Cattlesquat}}
